data.meta_description:
11K likes, 80 comments - guggenheim on June 8, 2024: "Happy birthday to visionary architect Frank Lloyd Wright, born on this day in 1867! ğŸ‚ Here are some fun facts about Wright you might not have known:

ğŸŒ€His real middle name was Lincoln. He later changed it to Lloyd, adopting his motherâ€™s maiden name as a way to honor her.

ğŸŒ€He never graduated high school and attended one semester of college in engineering at the University of Wisconsin before working for Chicago architect John Selby.

ğŸŒ€He disliked NYC, criticizing its skyscrapers. He agreed to design the Guggenheim only if it bordered nature, hence its location next to Central Park.

ğŸŒ€He initially named the Guggenheim â€œArcheseum,â€ his term for â€œArchitecture Museum.â€ This name appears on his construction drawings, specifications, and correspondence until 1956.
